subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Tampa Bay Rays left-hander Scott Kazmir, the strikeout leader in the American League last season, will be sidelined for at least two weeks of spring training because of an elbow strain, although he said he remained confident he would be ready for opening day.
